author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

You don’t need to know anything about the two assassination attempts on Trump’s life to see that a Trump supporter was almost certainly not behind them. Yet, Rep. Jasmine Crockett makes the baseless claim that all violence in this country largely comes from MAGA voters, using this faulty reasoning to back up her statement.

Rep. Jamsime Crockett:

"VioIence is all coming from MAGA, not the left. Even the 2 who tried kiIIing Trump are Trump supporters." pic.twitter.com/ddyL7TqwYn
— End Wokeness (@EndWokeness)
title: Left wing violence denier Jasmie Crockett blames it all on MAGA, including the people who tried to assassinate Trump

So, it turns out climate change isn't a top concern for most Americans... Who would've thought? Certainly not anyone with even a shred of common sense.

CNN just admitted the obvious: Americans have more pressing concerns than which way the wind blows.

🚨SHOCK POLL: CNN admits that the American people AREN'T CONCERNED about climate change — Radical activists FAILED to scare citizens.

"Americans AREN'T afraid of climate change!"

"Climate activists have not successfully made the case to the American people!" pic.twitter.com/47u9IzQ8IF
— Town
title: Shocking CNN poll shows just how little Americans are concerned with "climate change"

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Kamala Harris is even dumber than we thought — she actually believed a green soft drink would appeal to middle America.

According to the New York Post, Harris narrowed her three VP finalists based on their choice of soft drink. Walz chose Mountain Dew, and she had a “gut feeling” that this would resonate with more people than any other factor.

🚨 JUST IN: Kamala Harris' mind was made up about choosing Tim Walz for Vice President in 2024 after the 3 finalists made a simple choice for what to drink

Walz chose Diet Mountain Dew, the other 2 picked water

Kamala want
title: New book exposes why Kamala Harris chose Tim Walz for her running mate... it was the soda he drank

Our LEOs wear masks to protect their families. Two Democrat senators want to make that illegal. Donald Trump won't let
title: Donald Trump shuts down Democrat senators' attempt to dox "patriots" who are working for ICE and Border Patrol
